snippet.title: Police shoot knife-wielding man in NSW
snippet.content: An alleged knife-wielding man has been shot by police during a confrontation in northern NSW. Police first tasered then shot the man, who they say was holding a knife, after they arrived at a unit in Grafton following a report of a disturbance. He was taken to Grafton Hospital in a critical condition, while a critical incident team will now investigate the circumstances of the shooting. (C) AAP 2017
